casebody.data:
Gray et al., Appellants, v. State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, Appellee.

[Cite as Gray v. State Farm Mut. Auto. Ins. Co., 98 Ohio St.3d 1211, 2003-Ohio-1485.]

*1212(No. 2002-0549 Submitted March 12, 2003 Decided April 2, 2003.) Holbrock & Jonson Co., L.P.A., and Timothy R. Evans, for appellants. Eagen, Wykoff & Healy Co., L.P.A., and Thomas L. Eagen Jr., for appellee.

{¶ 1} The cause is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton and O’Con-nor, JJ., concur. Cook, J., not participating.
